context_bundle.summary: Jaeger: Distributed tracing system (CNCF). Visualize request flow across microservices. Key features: trace/span model, sampling strategies, dependency graphs, latency analysis, root cause analysis. Compatible with OpenTelemetry. Backends: Cassandra, Elasticsearch, Kafka.

onboarding.quick_start: Jaeger: 1) Deploy jaeger-all-in-one for dev (docker run jaegertracing/all-in-one), 2) Instrument app with OpenTelemetry SDK, 3) Export traces to Jaeger collector, 4) View in Jaeger UI at :16686, 5) Analyze service dependencies and latency.
common_patterns: Trace = collection of spans representing a request's journey
Span = unit of work with operation name, start time, duration, tags, logs
Context propagation: W3C Trace Context headers (traceparent, tracestate)
Sampling: probabilistic (1%), rate limiting, or adaptive

known_errors.error: Traces not appearing in Jaeger UI
known_errors.cause: Sampling rate too low, collector endpoint misconfigured, or spans not flushed
known_errors.solution: Check OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER=always_on for debugging, verify collector endpoint
known_errors.prevention: Always sample in dev, use probabilistic in prod with proper rate
